article_node.title: I am a retailing expert and here are 3 ways AI-driven shopping will change the way you buy
article_node.summary: The article discusses how AI is reshaping retail by enhancing customer experience, supply chain efficiency, and personalization while balancing automation with human touch. It highlights agentic AI’s role in autonomous decision‑making, inventory management, and customer interactions, noting consumer ambivalence and privacy concerns. Retailers are increasingly adopting AI for insights, marketing, and operations, but must address security, governance, and maintain human oversight to avoid loss of trust and operational risks.
